aircraft.value: Hydra Advanced - AC-6465-847 at Base Echo

defect_observed.value: Voltage fluctuation in primary bus system. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 29/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 31/03/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 31/03/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 03/04/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 08/04/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Voltage fluctuation in primary bus system. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
